title: Honey's Werewolf
description: This wolf is craving honey.Honey's seen a lot of weird things since she opened her own veterinary clinic. A big Viking dude with a kitten tangled in his beard isn't the oddest, but she doesn't date clients, not even handsome and insistent ones. Then again, given her lack of options, maybe it's time she broke her own rule.Ulric’s been waiting a long time to find “the one.” When he finally does encounter Dr. Honey Iris, it should have been his happily ever after. Wrong. She betrays him in the worst way possible. Or has she? By the time Ulric realizes he might have made a huge mistake, it's already too late.Can he make things right before he loses Honey forever?
author: Eve Langlais
